content.query:
USE nyc_tax_ldw;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats  WHERE name ='csv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,

    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
                      , STRING_DELIMITER ='"'
                      , FIRST_ROW=2
                      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE
                      , ENCODING='UTF8' 
                      , PARSER_VERSION ='2.0'
                    )

);

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats  WHERE name ='csv_file_format_pw1')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pw1
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,

    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
                      , STRING_DELIMITER ='"'
                      , FIRST_ROW=2
                      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE
                      , ENCODING='UTF8' 
                      , PARSER_VERSION ='1.0'
                    )

);



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats  WHERE name ='tsv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,

    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'
                      , STRING_DELIMITER ='"'
                      , FIRST_ROW=2
                      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE
                      , ENCODING='UTF8' 
                      , PARSER_VERSION ='1.0'
                    )

);
